original_text:
Mystery Motel
Dopo l’uscita nelle sale cinematografiche di Psycho, il famoso film di Hitchcock, i motel hanno smesso di essere un semplice luogo di passaggio in cui soggiornare per la notte e sono diventati posti da cui sarebbe meglio tenersi alla larga! L’ispirazione a questo capolavoro del cinema si sente tutta in Mystery Motel, la nuova slot della Hacksaw Gaming.
Tutto è importante a terrorizzare i giocatori, a partire dalla grafica e dai suoni sinistri che accompagnano le giocate. È notte, e sullo sfondo si staglia il motel segnalato anche dai cartelli che cadono a pezzi alla sinistra della griglia. In alto c’è l’insegna al neon con il nome della hotel e qualche corvo per rendere ancora più suggestiva l’atmosfera. Il comparto musicale è un motivetto incalzante intervallato di tanto in tanto dal verso dei corvi, altro richiamo all’immaginario hitchcockiano.
Nella parte bassa si trova il tasto per accedere al menù e i classici pulsanti per settare la scommessa, per lo Start e per l’Autoplay.
Caratteristiche della slot
La griglia ha una forma quadrata con 5 rulli e 5 righe, e ben 1.024 modalità di vincita.
Il range di scommessa è accessibile a tutti, dato che la puntata minima è di 0,20 € e la massima di 100 €.
Si vince quando simboli uguali compaiono su rulli adiacenti in qualsiasi punto della griglia. Per fare un esempio chiaro, non si vince se gli stessi simboli compaiono sul rullo 1, 2, e 5, quindi saltando il terzo e il quarto.
Dal menù è possibile disattivare la musica, accedere alle info del gioco o attivare la modalità turbo per accelerare la rotazione dei rulli, mentre on l’Autoplay si possono attivare da 10 a 1.000 giri automatici.
La volatilità è alta, perciò si vince meno spesso ma sempre cifre di alto livello. Il valore RTP è del 96,3%.
Simboli e funzionalità
In Mystery Motel ci sono simboli regolari e altri speciali. I primi si suddividono in simboli tematici e non. Quelli di più basso valore  sono rappresentati dalle carte da gioco: con la puntata minima di 0,20 € si vince da un minimo di 0,02 € con 3 simboli e 0,06 € con 5 simboli.
I simboli tematici hanno invece un valore più alto. Lo psicopatico con la mannaia e la cameriera pagano da 0,10 a 0,40 €, l’addetto alla reception sino a un massimo di 1 € e la ricca ospite sino a 2 €.
La valigia da cui fuoriesce una mano verde è il nostro simbolo Wild. Oltre a prendere il posto di tutti i simboli eccetto quelli speciali, ogni volta che compare verrà sostituito da un moltiplicatore variabile tra 2x, 3x o 5x. Nel caso di più moltiplicatori, essi vengono sommati. Facendo un calcolo veloce, il massimo moltiplicatore a cui possiamo aspirare è di 625x la puntata!
I tentacoli che escono dalla macchina sono invece il simbolo Scatter. Attiva una ruota con 3 livelli su cui sono presenti tre possibili premi: una freccia che fa passare al livello superiore, un moltiplicatore e dei giri gratis.
Un ulteriore simbolo speciale è la campanella della reception, che far ottenere alcuni Free Spins che possono essere riattivati sino a un massimo di 10 volte. Particolare da non sottovalutare, durante questa funzione aumenteranno i simboli Wild e quindi i moltiplicatori.
Attraverso il tasto sulla destra è possibile acquistare le funzioni speciali.
La partita Bonus ha un RTP pari al 97,62%.
Acquistando invece 12 giri gratuiti l’RTP scende a 96,13%, mentre con 20 il ritorno teorico al giocatore sarà del 96,19%.

raw_translation.response:
Experience the terror of the Mystery Motel slot game, inspired by Hitchcock's classic film Psycho. Hacksaw Gaming has truly captured the unsettling atmosphere with sinister graphics and haunting sound effects. The masterpiece of a game boasts 1,024 ways to win on a 5x5 grid.

But don't let the terror scare you away from the game. The variety in betting ranges, from a minimum of €0.20 to a maximum of €100, assures accessibility to all types of players. The high volatility in the game allows for the potential of winning large sums of money, as long as matching symbols appear on adjacent reels in any part of the grid.

The game features both regular and special symbols that range in value. Wild symbols, represented by a green hand coming out of a suitcase, replace all symbols except for the special ones. Plus, each occurrence of a wild symbol earns a variable multiplier of 2x, 3x, or 5x, and if there are multiple multipliers, they all add up for a potential maximum multiplier of 625x the original bet.

Special symbols include the tentacles that emerge from the machine, which activate a wheel with three levels, offering potential prizes such as arrows that take players up a level, multipliers, and free spins. The bell at the reception desk offers another opportunity for free spins that can be reactivated up to 10 times, increasing the number of wild symbols and multipliers.

If you're feeling bold, you can even purchase special features through the button on the right. The bonus game has an RTP of 97.62%, while purchasing 12 free spins brings it down to 96.13%, and 20 free spins bring a theoretical return to the player of 96.19%.

Come experience the terror and thrill of the Mystery Motel slot game and see for yourself why it's a must-try for experienced gamblers.

raw_translation.response:
"Mystery Motel" Slot Game Review 

After the release of Hitchcock's famous film "Psycho", motels ceased to be a simple place to stay for the night and became places to avoid! This is felt in every aspect of "Mystery Motel", the new slot game from Hacksaw Gaming, which is inspired by this masterpiece of cinema.

The graphics and sinister sounds that accompany gameplay are all designed to terrify players. It's nighttime, and the motel looms in the background, marked by signs that are falling apart to the left of the grid. Above is the neon sign with the name of the hotel and a few crows to make the atmosphere even more eerie. The music is a haunting theme that is occasionally interrupted by the sound of crows, further invoking the Hitchcockian imagery.

The grid has a square shape with 5 reels and 5 rows, and an incredible 1,024 ways to win. The betting range is accessible to all, with a minimum bet of €0.20 and a maximum of €100.

You win when matching symbols appear on adjacent reels in any position on the grid. For example, you don't win if the same symbols appear on reels 1, 2, and 5, skipping the third and fourth.

There are regular symbols and special symbols in "Mystery Motel". The lower value symbols are represented by playing cards, while the themed symbols are worth more. The maniac with the axe and the waitress pay from €0.10 to €0.40, the receptionist up to a maximum of €1, and the wealthy guest up to €2.

The suitcase from which a green hand emerges is our Wild symbol. In addition to replacing all symbols except for special ones, every time it appears it will be replaced by a multiplier that varies between 2x, 3x, or 5x. In the case of multiple multipliers, they are added together. In total, the maximum multiplier is 625x the bet!

The tentacles that come out of the machine are the Scatter symbol. It activates a wheel with 3 levels, where there are three possible prizes: an arrow that moves to the next level, a multiplier, and free spins.

Another special symbol is the reception bell, which gives some Free Spins that can be reactivated up to a maximum of 10 times. It's worth noting that during this feature, there will be more Wild symbols and therefore more multipliers.

Through the button on the right, it is possible to purchase special functions.

The Bonus round has an RTP of 97.62%.

By purchasing 12 free spins, the RTP drops to 96.13%, while with 20, the theoretical return to the player will be 96.19%. 

All in all, "Mystery Motel" is a thrilling slot game that will keep experienced gamblers on the edge of their seat!

message.content: {"topics": ["Gameplay Features", "Design and Sound Effects", "Special Symbols", "Bonus Round Details", "RTP"]}

response.headline: Gameplay Features
response.content: The gameplay of Mystery Motel features a 5x5 grid with 1,024 ways to win and a minimum bet of €0.20 and a maximum of €100. To win, matching symbols must appear on adjacent reels in any position on the grid. There are regular symbols and special symbols, including Wild and Scatter symbols as well as the reception bell symbol that triggers Free Spins.

response.headline: Special Symbols
response.content: In Mystery Motel, special symbols include the Wild symbol in the form of a hand emerging from a suitcase which multiplies your winnings up to 625x. There is also the Scatter symbol represented by tentacles emerging from the machine, which activates a wheel with three levels that can result in multipliers, free spins, or progression to the next level. The reception bell symbol triggers Free Spins, and there are more Wild symbols during this feature for even more multipliers.

response.headline: Graphics and Sounds
response.content: The graphics and sounds in Mystery Motel are designed to set the tense and creepy mood inspired by the Hitchcockian motif behind this game. The nighttime setting of the motel looms ominously in the background while the music has a haunting theme that is occasionally interrupted by the sound of crows, creating a suspenseful atmosphere for the game.

response.headline: Bonus Round
response.content: Mystery Motel's Bonus round has an RTP of 97.62%. Purchasing 12 free spins brings the RTP down to 96.13%, and 20 free spins sees an RTP of 96.19%. The special functions that can be purchased give players access to unique bonus features not found in the main game, making it a worthwhile addition for experienced players who are looking for even more excitement in their gameplay.

response.headline: Return to Player (RTP)
response.content: The theoretical return to player in Mystery Motel is quite high with 97.62% for the Bonus round. However, that RTP drops to 96.13% when players purchase 12 free spins and 96.19% with 20 free spins. It's important to keep in mind that RTP only indicates the average expected return over a long period and isn't a guarantee of any particular outcome, and results will always vary with each player and session of the game.

Below is a review for the slot game "Mystery Motel".

Gameplay Features
Special Symbols
Graphics and Sounds
Bonus Round
Return to Player (RTP)

- The review must be very detailed
- No FAQ
- No Notes
- Respond with a JSON array, one item per topic (use the keys "headline" and "content")

Review: "Mystery Motel" Slot Game Review 

After the release of Hitchcock's famous film "Psycho", motels ceased to be a simple place to stay for the night and became places to avoid! This is felt in every aspect of "Mystery Motel", the new slot game from Hacksaw Gaming, which is inspired by this masterpiece of cinema.

The graphics and sinister sounds that accompany gameplay are all designed to terrify players. It's nighttime, and the motel looms in the background, marked by signs that are falling apart to the left of the grid. Above is the neon sign with the name of the hotel and a few crows to make the atmosphere even more eerie. The music is a haunting theme that is occasionally interrupted by the sound of crows, further invoking the Hitchcockian imagery.

The grid has a square shape with 5 reels and 5 rows, and an incredible 1,024 ways to win. The betting range is accessible to all, with a minimum bet of €0.20 and a maximum of €100.

You win when matching symbols appear on adjacent reels in any position on the grid. For example, you don't win if the same symbols appear on reels 1, 2, and 5, skipping the third and fourth.

There are regular symbols and special symbols in "Mystery Motel". The lower value symbols are represented by playing cards, while the themed symbols are worth more. The maniac with the axe and the waitress pay from €0.10 to €0.40, the receptionist up to a maximum of €1, and the wealthy guest up to €2.

The suitcase from which a green hand emerges is our Wild symbol. In addition to replacing all symbols except for special ones, every time it appears it will be replaced by a multiplier that varies between 2x, 3x, or 5x. In the case of multiple multipliers, they are added together. In total, the maximum multiplier is 625x the bet!

The tentacles that come out of the machine are the Scatter symbol. It activates a wheel with 3 levels, where there are three possible prizes: an arrow that moves to the next level, a multiplier, and free spins.

Another special symbol is the reception bell, which gives some Free Spins that can be reactivated up to a maximum of 10 times. It's worth noting that during this feature, there will be more Wild symbols and therefore more multipliers.

Through the button on the right, it is possible to purchase special functions.

The Bonus round has an RTP of 97.62%.

By purchasing 12 free spins, the RTP drops to 96.13%, while with 20, the theoretical return to the player will be 96.19%. 

All in all, "Mystery Motel" is a thrilling slot game that will keep experienced gamblers on the edge of their seat!

response.headline: Gameplay Features
response.content:
Let's talk about the juicy gameplay of Mystery Motel, shall we? This game is like no other! With a 5x5 grid and an impressive 1,024 ways to win, this game is a real treat. You can start betting from just €0.20, but if you're feeling lucky, go ahead and splurge with the maximum bet of €100.

Matching symbols must appear on adjacent reels in any position on the grid in order to win something. The symbols include regular ones and some special ones that will make your stay at the motel far from boring! There are Wild symbols that will substitute any other symbol, and Scatter symbols that will just drive you insane (in a good way!). You also don't want to miss the reception bell symbol that triggers Free Spins! It's like getting a free room upgrade at the motel, but without the bedbugs.

response.headline: Special Symbols
response.content:
Get ready to hit the jackpot with Mystery Motel's unique and quirky symbols! Keep an eye out for the Wild symbol, which takes the form of a hand bursting from a suitcase. With this symbol, you can multiply your winnings up to a whopping 625 times! Not bad for a disembodied hand, eh?

But that's not all - the Scatter symbol, represented by tentacles creeping out of the slot machine, takes you on a wild ride by activating a wheel with three levels. Spin to win multipliers, free spins, or even progress to the next level. And let's not forget about the reception bell symbol which triggers a bunch of Free Spins; it's like ringing the dinner bell for more chances to win big. During the bonus feature, you'll even encounter more Wild symbols for even more multipliers. This game is so good, it's almost criminal!

response.headline: Graphics and Sounds
response.content:
If you love the thrill of the unknown and the creepy-crawly feeling down your spine, then you'll definitely appreciate the superb graphics and eerie sounds of Mystery Motel. The developers certainly succeeded in creating a mood that Hitchcock himself would approve of!

The dark and ominous nighttime setting of the motel serves as the perfect backdrop to accentuate the spooky ambiance. And the haunting theme music with occasional cawing sounds of crows crank up the suspense, making the game all the more thrilling.

response.headline: Let’s Talk About That Moolah! (Return to Player)
response.content: Looking for a slot game with an outstanding return to player (RTP)? Look no further than Mystery Motel. With a theoretical RTP of 97.62% for the Bonus round, you’re one step closer to winning that moolah. Remember, RTP is merely an average of the expected return, so don’t lose hope if you don’t strike gold on your first go. Keep spinning, and you might be the one that Mystery Motel chooses as the next lucky winner!

response.headline: Design and Sound Effects: It's Spooktacular!
response.content:
Are you ready to be spooked? Well, prepare yourself because Mystery Motel has some creepy graphics and eerie sounds that will haun... err, enhance your gameplay experience. The backdrop of the game is set at night, with a motel that seems to have seen better days. The signs on the left of the grid are falling apart, and the neon sign above flickers eerily while a few ominous crows watch from above.

And let's not forget about the music - it's hauntingly beautiful! Occasionally, you'll hear the sound of crows, which only adds to the Hitchcockian atmosphere of the game. So, buckle up and get ready for a nail-biting experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat... or bed... or wherever you're playing this game from!

response.headline: Special Symbols
response.content: 'Mystery Motel' has a mix of regular and special symbols. The lower value symbols are all the boring playing cards. However, the big bucks come from the themed symbols. Keep an eye out for the suitcase, because it contains a green hand (no, not the Incredible Hulk). It's actually the Wild symbol, and can replace all symbols except the special ones. Plus, every time it appears, it brings a surprise multiplier of either 2x, 3x, or 5x (kind of like when your grandma gives you a birthday card with money in it). Now, for the Scatter symbol, it's a weird one. It's represented by the tentacles that come out of the machine (which, if you think about it, makes no sense at all). But, it's special nonetheless. Oh, and another special symbol is the reception bell. If you get that bad boy, you're in for some Free Spins. And the best part? It can be reactivated up to 10 times (which is more than we can say for most people on Monday mornings).

response.headline: Bonus Round Details
response.content: It's time to get tentacled! When those scatter tentacles appear, get ready for a wild ride! You'll activate a wheel with 3 levels, where you can win three possible prizes: first, there's an arrow that moves you to the next level (yes, we know it sounds like a video game - bear with us); secondly, there's a multiplier that will make you feel like a true winner. And thirdly, the holy grail of any online slot game: free spins. But that's not all my dear friends. During the mighty free spin feature, the Wild symbols appear even more frequently, giving you more multipliers, and making it even easier to win big. And just when you thought it couldn't get any better, the game offers you the chance to purchase special functions - because why not? We didn't say it was cheap, but we did say it could be game-changing. Who's ready to take on the tentacles?

response.headline: RTP Who? RTP What?
response.content:
RTP may sound like a fancy financial term, but in the world of slot games, it stands for Return to Player. In other words, how much money can you get back from the game? In the case of Mystery Motel, the Bonus Round boasts an impressive RTP of 97.62%! That's a higher chance of winning than getting struck by lightning while finding a needle in a haystack.

But hold your horses, if you purchase 12 free spins, the RTP drops to 96.13%. Still not too shabby, but we'd rather stick with the original. If you're feeling lucky and get 20 free spins, the theoretical return to you is 96.19%. It's like going on a date with someone you met online, sure the odds may not be in your favor, but at least you'll have fun trying!

Review:
 
Gameplay Features

The gameplay of Mystery Motel features a 5x5 grid with 1,024 ways to win and a minimum bet of €0.20 and a maximum of €100. To win, matching symbols must appear on adjacent reels in any position on the grid. There are regular symbols and special symbols, including Wild and Scatter symbols as well as the reception bell symbol that triggers Free Spins.

Special Symbols

In Mystery Motel, special symbols include the Wild symbol in the form of a hand emerging from a suitcase which multiplies your winnings up to 625x. There is also the Scatter symbol represented by tentacles emerging from the machine, which activates a wheel with three levels that can result in multipliers, free spins, or progression to the next level. The reception bell symbol triggers Free Spins, and there are more Wild symbols during this feature for even more multipliers.

Graphics and Sounds

The graphics and sounds in Mystery Motel are designed to set the tense and creepy mood inspired by the Hitchcockian motif behind this game. The nighttime setting of the motel looms ominously in the background while the music has a haunting theme that is occasionally interrupted by the sound of crows, creating a suspenseful atmosphere for the game.

Bonus Round

Mystery Motel's Bonus round has an RTP of 97.62%. Purchasing 12 free spins brings the RTP down to 96.13%, and 20 free spins sees an RTP of 96.19%. The special functions that can be purchased give players access to unique bonus features not found in the main game, making it a worthwhile addition for experienced players who are looking for even more excitement in their gameplay.

Return to Player (RTP)

The theoretical return to player in Mystery Motel is quite high with 97.62% for the Bonus round. However, that RTP drops to 96.13% when players purchase 12 free spins and 96.19% with 20 free spins. It's important to keep in mind that RTP only indicates the average expected return over a long period and isn't a guarantee of any particular outcome, and results will always vary with each player and session of the game.

The scatter tentacles activate a wheel with 3 levels, where there are three possible prizes: an arrow that moves to the next level, a multiplier, and free spins. During the Free Spins feature, there will be more Wild symbols and therefore more multipliers. Through the button on the right, it is possible to purchase special functions.

RTP

The Bonus round has an RTP of 97.62%. By purchasing 12 free spins, the RTP drops to 96.13%, while with 20, the theoretical return to the player will be 96.19%.

Review: "Mystery Motel" Slot Game Review 

After the release of Hitchcock's famous film "Psycho", motels ceased to be a simple place to stay for the night and became places to avoid! This is felt in every aspect of "Mystery Motel", the new slot game from Hacksaw Gaming, which is inspired by this masterpiece of cinema.

The graphics and sinister sounds that accompany gameplay are all designed to terrify players. It's nighttime, and the motel looms in the background, marked by signs that are falling apart to the left of the grid. Above is the neon sign with the name of the hotel and a few crows to make the atmosphere even more eerie. The music is a haunting theme that is occasionally interrupted by the sound of crows, further invoking the Hitchcockian imagery.

The grid has a square shape with 5 reels and 5 rows, and an incredible 1,024 ways to win. The betting range is accessible to all, with a minimum bet of €0.20 and a maximum of €100.

You win when matching symbols appear on adjacent reels in any position on the grid. For example, you don't win if the same symbols appear on reels 1, 2, and 5, skipping the third and fourth.

There are regular symbols and special symbols in "Mystery Motel". The lower value symbols are represented by playing cards, while the themed symbols are worth more. The maniac with the axe and the waitress pay from €0.10 to €0.40, the receptionist up to a maximum of €1, and the wealthy guest up to €2.

The suitcase from which a green hand emerges is our Wild symbol. In addition to replacing all symbols except for special ones, every time it appears it will be replaced by a multiplier that varies between 2x, 3x, or 5x. In the case of multiple multipliers, they are added together. In total, the maximum multiplier is 625x the bet!

The tentacles that come out of the machine are the Scatter symbol. It activates a wheel with 3 levels, where there are three possible prizes: an arrow that moves to the next level, a multiplier, and free spins.

Another special symbol is the reception bell, which gives some Free Spins that can be reactivated up to a maximum of 10 times. It's worth noting that during this feature, there will be more Wild symbols and therefore more multipliers.

Through the button on the right, it is possible to purchase special functions.

The Bonus round has an RTP of 97.62%.

By purchasing 12 free spins, the RTP drops to 96.13%, while with 20, the theoretical return to the player will be 96.19%. 

All in all, "Mystery Motel" is a thrilling slot game that will keep experienced gamblers on the edge of their seat!
